verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֞ר <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> that came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> from the LORD אַחַ֣ר ׀ <WH310> after שַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> had let him go אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> נְבוּזַרְאֲדָ֛ן <WH5018> that Nebuzaradan רַב־ <WH7227> the captain טַבָּחִ֖ים <WH2876> of the guard מִן־ <WH4480> from הָֽרָמָ֑ה <WH7414> from Ramah בְּקַחְתּ֣וֹ <WH3947> when he had taken אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> him אָס֤וּר <WH631> him being bound בָּֽאזִקִּים֙ <WH246> in chains בְּת֨וֹךְ <WH8432> among כָּל־ <WH3605> all גָּל֤וּת <WH1546> all that were carried away captive יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> of Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and Judah הַמֻּגְלִ֖ים <WH1540> which were carried away captive בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> unto Babylon

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> took רַב־ <WH7227> And the captain טַבָּחִ֖ים <WH2876> of the guard לְיִרְמְיָ֑הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> against יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto him The LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God דִּבֶּר֙ <WH1696> hath pronounced אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָעָ֣ה <WH7451> this evil הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise אֶל־ <WH413> against הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> upon this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> hath brought וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <WH6213> [it] and done יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Now the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he דִּבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> according as he hath said כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because חֲטָאתֶ֤ם <WH2398> because ye have sinned לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> against the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and did not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֣ם <WH8085> and have not obeyed בְּקוֹל֔וֹ <WH6963> his voice וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> has happened לָכֶ֖ם [דָּבָר כ] (הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> act ק) הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְעַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> now הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> behold פִתַּחְתִּ֣יךָ <WH6605> And now behold I loose הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> thee this day מִֽן־ <WH4480> from הָאזִקִּים֮ <WH246> from the chains אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> after יָדֶךָ֒ <WH3027> which [were] upon thine hand אִם־ <WH518> If ט֨וֹב <WH2896> good בְּעֵינֶ֜יךָ <WH5869> affliction לָב֧וֹא <WH935> unto thee to come אִתִּ֣י <WH854> for בָבֶ֗ל <WH894> with me into Babylon בֹּ֚א <WH935> come וְאָשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> appoint אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינִי֙ <WH5869> affliction עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> after וְאִם־ <WH518> if רַ֧ע <WH7489> afflict בְּעֵינֶ֛יךָ <WH5869> affliction לָבֽוֹא־ <WH935> unto thee to come אִתִּ֥י <WH854> for בָבֶ֖ל <WH894> with me into Babylon חֲדָ֑ל <WH2308> forbear רְאֵה֙ <WH7200> behold כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> all the land לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> [is] before אֶל־ <WH413> thee whither it seemeth ט֨וֹב <WH2896> good וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַיָּשָׁ֧ר <WH3477> right בְּעֵינֶ֛יךָ <WH5869> affliction לָלֶ֥כֶת <WH1980> go שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> wherever לֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> to go

וְעוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <WH5750> was still לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָשׁ֗וּב <WH7725> Now while he was not yet gone back וְשֻׁ֡בָה <WH7725> [he said] Go back אֶל־ <WH413> then גְּדַלְיָ֣ה <WH1436> also to Gedaliah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָ֣ם <WH296> of Ahikam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָ֡ן <WH8227> of Shaphan אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom הִפְקִ֨יד <WH6485> hath made governor מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> whom the king בָּבֶ֜ל <WH894> of Babylon בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> over the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah וְשֵׁ֤ב <WH3427> and dwell אִתּוֹ֙ <WH854> for בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> with him among הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people א֠וֹ <WH176> or אֶל־ <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> anywhere הַיָּשָׁ֧ר <WH3477> right בְּעֵינֶ֛יךָ <WH5869> affliction לָלֶ֖כֶת <WH1980> go לֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> to go וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> gave ל֧וֹ רַב־ <WH7227> So the captain טַבָּחִ֛ים <WH2876> of the guard אֲרֻחָ֥ה <WH737> him victuals וּמַשְׂאֵ֖ת <WH4864> and a reward וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7971> and let him go

וַיָּבֹ֧א <WH935> Then went יִרְמְיָ֛הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּדַלְיָ֥ה <WH1436> unto Gedaliah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָ֖ם <WH296> of Ahikam הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <WH4708> to Mizpah וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt אִתּוֹ֙ <WH854> for בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> with him among הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <WH7604> that were left בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land ס

וַיִּשְׁמְעוּ֩ <WH8085> heard כָל־ <WH3605> now all שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> Now when all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֜ים <WH2428> of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> which [were] in the fields הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> they וְאַנְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <WH376> and their men כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִפְקִ֧יד <WH6485> governor מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> that the king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> of Babylon אֶת־ <WH853> גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <WH1436> had made Gedaliah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָ֖ם <WH296> of Ahikam בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the land וְכִ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for הִפְקִ֣יד <WH6485> and had committed אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> for אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> of the men וְנָשִׁים֙ <WH802> and women וָטָ֔ף <WH2945> and children וּמִדַּלַּ֣ת <WH1803> and of the poor הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not הָגְל֖וּ <WH1540> of them that were not carried away captive בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> to Babylon

וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> Then they came אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּדַלְיָ֖ה <WH1436> to Gedaliah הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <WH4708> to Mizpah וְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> even Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָ֡הוּ <WH5418> of Nethaniah וְיוֹחָנָ֣ן <WH3110> and Johanan וְיוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3129> and Jonathan בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the sons קָ֠רֵחַ <WH7143> of Kareah וּשְׂרָיָ֨ה <WH8304> and Seraiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son תַּנְחֻ֜מֶת <WH8576> of Tanhumeth וּבְנֵ֣י ׀ <WH1121> and the sons [עֹופַי כ] (עֵיפַ֣י <WH5778> Ephai ק) הַנְּטֹפָתִ֗י <WH5200> the Netophathite וִֽיזַנְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3153> and Jezaniah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הַמַּ֣עֲכָתִ֔י <WH4602> of a Maachathite הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they וְאַנְשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <WH582> they and their men

וַיִּשָּׁבַ֨ע <WH7650> sware לָהֶ֜ם גְּדַלְיָ֨הוּ <WH1436> And Gedaliah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָ֤ם <WH296> of Ahikam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָן֙ <WH8227> of Shaphan וּלְאַנְשֵׁיהֶ֣ם <WH376> their men לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְא֖וּ <WH3372> Fear מֵעֲב֣וֹד <WH5647> not to serve הַכַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <WH3778> the Chaldeans שְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> dwell in בָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> the land וְעִבְד֛וּ <WH5647> and serve אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon וְיִיטַ֥ב <WH3190> and it shall be well לָכֶֽם׃

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> I am going יֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> As for me behold I will dwell בַּמִּצְפָּ֔ה <WH4709> at Mizpah לַֽעֲמֹד֙ <WH5975> to stand לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> the Chaldeans אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יָבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> which will come אֵלֵ֑ינוּ <WH413> about וְאַתֶּ֡ם <WH859> you אִסְפוּ֩ <WH622> unto us but ye gather יַ֨יִן <WH3196> ye wine וְקַ֜יִץ <WH7019> and summer fruits וְשֶׁ֗מֶן <WH8081> and oil וְשִׂ֙מוּ֙ <WH7760> and put בִּכְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH3627> [them] in your vessels וּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> and dwell בְּעָרֵיכֶ֥ם <WH5892> in your cities אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who תְּפַשְׂתֶּֽם׃ <WH8610> that ye have taken

וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> also כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all הַיְּהוּדִ֡ים <WH3064> Likewise when all the Jews אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בְּמוֹאָ֣ב ׀ <WH4124> that [were] in Moab וּבִבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the son עַמּ֨וֹן <WH5983> and among the Ammonites וּבֶאֱד֜וֹם <WH123> and in Edom וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> and who בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָֽאֲרָצוֹת֙ <WH776> and that [were] in all the countries שָֽׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> heard כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> had left מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> that the king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> of Babylon שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> a remnant לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וְכִי֙ <WH3588> for הִפְקִ֣יד <WH6485> and that he had set עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> over אֶת־ <WH853> גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH1436> over them Gedaliah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָ֥ם <WH296> of Ahikam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָֽן׃ <WH8227> of Shaphan

וַיָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <WH7725> returned out כָל־ <WH3605> all הַיְּהוּדִ֗ים <WH3064> Even all the Jews מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּקֹמוֹת֙ <WH4725> of all places אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to which נִדְּחוּ־ <WH5080> whither they were driven שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> in it וַיָּבֹ֧אוּ <WH935> and came אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> to the land יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH1436> to Gedaliah הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <WH4708> unto Mizpah וַיַּאַסְפ֛וּ <WH622> and gathered יַ֥יִן <WH3196> wine וָקַ֖יִץ <WH7019> and summer fruits הַרְבֵּ֥ה <WH7235> much מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> very פ

וְיֽוֹחָנָן֙ <WH3110> Moreover Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <WH7143> of Kareah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <WH2428> of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> were בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> that [were] in the fields בָּ֥אוּ <WH935> came אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH1436> to Gedaliah הַמִּצְפָּֽתָה׃ <WH4708> to Mizpah

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him הֲיָדֹ֤עַ <WH3045> unto him Dost thou certainly תֵּדַע֙ <WH3045> know כִּ֞י <WH3588> that בַּעֲלִ֣יס ׀ <WH1185> that Baalis מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the son עַמּ֗וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon שָׁלַח֙ <WH7971> hath sent אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָ֔ה <WH5418> of Nethaniah לְהַכֹּתְךָ֖ <WH5221> to take נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> any וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not הֶאֱמִ֣ין <WH539> believed לָהֶ֔ם גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH1436> thee? But Gedaliah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָֽם׃ <WH296> of Ahikam

וְיוֹחָנָ֣ן <WH3110> Then Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קָרֵ֡חַ <WH7143> of Kareah אָמַ֣ר <WH559> spake אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּדַלְיָהוּ֩ <WH1436> to Gedaliah בַסֵּ֨תֶר <WH5643> secretly בַּמִּצְפָּ֜ה <WH4709> in Mizpah לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying אֵ֤לְכָה <WH1980> go נָּא֙ <WH4994> I beseech thee וְאַכֶּה֙ <WH5221> I pray thee and I will slay אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָ֔ה <WH5418> of Nethaniah וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> and no man לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֵדָ֑ע <WH3045> shall know לָ֧מָּה <WH4100> Why יַכֶּ֣כָּה <WH5221> take נֶּ֗פֶשׁ <WH5315> your life וְנָפֹ֙צוּ֙ <WH6327> unto thee should be scattered כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3064> thee that all the Jews הַנִּקְבָּצִ֣ים <WH6908> which are gathered אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about וְאָבְדָ֖ה <WH6> perish שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> and the remnant יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> in Judah

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said גְּדַלְיָ֤הוּ <WH1436> But Gedaliah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָם֙ <WH296> of Ahikam אֶל־ <WH413> about יוֹחָנָ֣ן <WH3110> unto Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <WH7143> of Kareah אַֽל־ <WH408> nay [תַּעַשׂ כ] (תַּעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> accomplish ק) אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שֶׁ֛קֶר <WH8267> falsely אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you דֹבֵ֖ר <WH1696> for thou speakest אֶל־ <WH413> about יִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <WH3458> of Ishmael ס
